LanguageData.ShipBasics.label: 星际航行基础
LanguageData.ShipBasics.description: 解锁建造星际飞船的结构和辅助单元，这是建造飞船离开恒星系的第一步。
LanguageData.ShipBasics.discoveredLetterText:
逃离这个星球——最终将获得自由，也许终点会是家园。

但先别急，在你考虑星际旅行之前，你需要先造艘船或者用其它什么方法，到达环绕这颗星球的轨道上。一艘适合航天任务的飞船的最低要求是要有一个火箭推进器、一个领航员控制台和一个基础集成传感器。为了你的殖民者能在太空存活，还需要船舶生命维持系统或EVA服。

发射一艘飞船计入轨道所要消耗的燃料量取决于其的大小。较大的飞船需要要且只会要更多的推进器。
LanguageData.ShipReactor.label: 船用裂变反应堆
LanguageData.ShipReactor.description: 通过燃烧核燃料舱来获得长期持续的能量输出。
LanguageData.ShipEngine.label: 火箭推进器
LanguageData.ShipEngine.description: 为一艘飞船建造化学发动机。这样它们就能抵达轨道，但也就能到这了。
LanguageData.ShipEngine.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->通过教授当地部落如何提炼化合燃料而成功逃离了一颗边缘世界星球
LanguageData.ShipEngine.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->为世界中央政府设计了一个导弹推进器
LanguageData.ShipEngine.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->开创了后末日星球伊什瓦拉重返太空的先河
LanguageData.ShipEngine.generalRules.rulesStrings.4: subject_gerund->保持最佳的燃料与氧化剂的配比
LanguageData.SoSJTDrive.label: 约翰逊-田中驱动器
LanguageData.SoSJTDrive.description: 了解无工质推进器约翰逊-田中驱动器如何进行行星和星际航行背后的原理。\n注：实际建造驱动器将需要一个纠缠流形，这是个非常罕见的先进组件。
LanguageData.ShipPilotSeat.label: 船舶导航
LanguageData.ShipPilotSeat.description: 让你的殖民者能够在基本的计算机辅助下驾驶一艘飞船。
subject_story->在一次舰船登陆行动中幸存下来后，认定下一艘舰船也会蓄意而为
subject_story->超控舰船的目标计算机，用一枚鱼雷精确地摧毁敌方的巨型建筑
subject_story->谨慎规画了一条穿过伊什瓦拉星球那致密的碎片场的航线
LanguageData.ShipComputerCore.label: 船舶电脑核心
LanguageData.ShipComputerCore.description: 允许将现有的人格AI强制转换为可用于引导船舶的电脑核心。
LanguageData.ShipAvatarCasket.label: 来世棺材
LanguageData.ShipAvatarCasket.description: 利用纳米机械分解一个生物的尸体，并创造一种仿制其生物功能的形态凝胶，使已死之人再活一次。
LanguageData.ShipAvatarCasket.generalRules.rulesStrin: subject_story->在姚博士进行初期微械凝胶体实验期间，曾在神化号空间站上任职
subject_story->经营一个闪耀世界的来世墓地，使已死之人可以以微型凝胶体的形式再活一次
subject_story->在一场致死事故之后，他作为微械凝胶体花了几个世纪的时间，试图理解这种新的存在形式
subject_gerund->使死者重生为微械凝胶体
LanguageData.ShipSensorCluster.label: 基础传感器
LanguageData.ShipSensorCluster.description: 为飞船建造一个基础集成传感器，使其能够进行基本导航和观察地表指定区域。
LanguageData.ShipSensorClusterAdv.label: 先进传感器
LanguageData.ShipSensorClusterAdv.description: 为飞船建造一个先进集成传感器，使其能够自动扫描敌舰内部。
LanguageData.ShipSensorClusterAdv.generalRules.rulesS: subject_story->使用尖端的传感器支援跳帮行动，指挥海军陆战队切断了脆弱的热能导管
subject_story->痴迷于窥探神秘的超凡科技无人机的机身
subject_story->担任一支小型海贼猎人舰队的指挥官，利用先进的传感器避免开火击中海盗囚禁人质的舱室
LanguageData.ShipLifeSupport.label: 生命维持系统
LanguageData.ShipLifeSupport.description: 循环氧气以保持非休眠殖民者的生命。
LanguageData.ShipLifeSupport.generalRules.rulesString: subject_story->saved an early generation ship from disaster by improving the genetics of oxygen-producing algae
subject_story->refused to travel on starships after learning that their drinking water was recycled from sweat and sewage
subject_story->served under a notoriously stingy starship captain, and once had to jury-rig a CO2 scrubber from an old sock
subject_gerund->maintaining livable conditions in a sealed environment
LanguageData.ShipSpaceSuits.label: 舱外活动装备
LanguageData.ShipSpaceSuits.description: 内置有自给自足的生命维持系统，使殖民者能够在外太空中生存。
LanguageData.ShipSpaceSuits.generalRules.rulesStrings: subject_story->discovered the hard way how human eyeballs react to vacuum
subject_story->led a clan of nomadic asteroid miners who revered their vac-suits as ancestral treasures
subject_story->organized the evacuation of the crippled passenger liner KSS Calypso
LanguageData.ShipSpaceSuitsHeavy.label: EVA动力装甲
LanguageData.ShipSpaceSuitsHeavy.description: 将生命维持技术应用于动力装甲，生产一种能使穿戴者在外太空中生存的装甲服。
LanguageData.ShipSpaceSuitsHeavy.generalRules.rulesSt: subject_story->served as quartermaster of an Imperial patrol ship during the fall of Sophiamunda
subject_story->was the lone survivor of a boarding action against a mechanoid battlesphere, thanks to special armor modifications
subject_story->defeated the pirate lord Mboko in single combat after audaciously boarding his flagship
LanguageData.Crittersleep.label: 动物低温休眠舱
LanguageData.Crittersleep.description: 解锁建造用于小型动物休眠的休眠舱，可以容纳多指小动物，以及用于存放蛋的休眠卵箱。
LanguageData.Crittersleep.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->researched the psychological effects of separation from one's pets
LanguageData.Crittersleep.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->refused to leave the cats behind while evacuating a doomed colony
LanguageData.Crittersleep.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->miniaturized the biomonitors used by large-scale cryptovaults
LanguageData.Crittersleep.generalRules.rulesStrings.4: subject_gerund->keeping many small animals alive within one device
LanguageData.ShipCryptosleep.label: 逃生舱
LanguageData.ShipCryptosleep.description: 设计可用于载入大气低温休眠舱，且不需要人工手动开启。建议在任何飞船上都至少装备一个这样的设备。
LanguageData.ShipCryptosleep.generalRules.rulesString: subject_story->replaced the failed cryptosleep caskets on the CMC Celeste, so the old generation ship could be used again
subject_story->was accidentally ejected in deep space, surviving in a self-designed casket for two months
subject_story->lectured on the differences between planetary- and starship-grade equipment
LanguageData.ShipCapacitor.label: 电容器阵列
LanguageData.ShipCapacitor.description: 利用金属塑料的介电特性来实现高效且高容量的储能。
subject_story->grew tired of watching batteries explode seemingly at random
subject_story->adapted a fuel-processing platform to run on solar power after the failure of its primary reactor
subject_story->became obsessed with safe power delivery to starship weaponry following a tragic conduit explosion
LanguageData.ShipShields.label: 护盾发生器
LanguageData.ShipShields.description: 利用动能斥力场来保护你的舰船。
LanguageData.ShipShields.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->helped the post-apocalyptic planet Ishwalla return to spaceflight, designing a shield which could survive its orbital debris rings
LanguageData.ShipShields.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->tuned a warship's shields to protect a planetside settlement from solar flares
LanguageData.ShipShields.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->wrote an influential thesis on using shields to red-shift incoming laser beams
LanguageData.ShipCloaking.label: 隐形装置
LanguageData.ShipCloaking.description: 隐藏舰船的热发射源以防止敌人注意到你。
LanguageData.ShipCloaking.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->helped thousands of refugees slip past an Imperial blockade
LanguageData.ShipCloaking.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->ran intelligence-gathering operations from a cloaked dropship
LanguageData.ShipCloaking.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->grew tired of constant pirate attacks in the orbit of a rimworld
LanguageData.HullFoam.label: 修补泡沫
LanguageData.HullFoam.description: 解锁制作船体修补泡沫，一种可喷涂并硬化成气密墙的物质。用于快速填补飞船上的漏洞。
LanguageData.HullFoam.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->held off a pirate boarding party by blocking corridors with hullfoam
LanguageData.HullFoam.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->saved an early generation ship by repairing structural damage suffered during its deceleration burn
LanguageData.HullFoam.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->became obsessed with cocooning the ship in protective layers after suffering radiation exposure
LanguageData.ShipSalvageBay.label: 打捞港
LanguageData.ShipSalvageBay.description: 利用自动龙门架和大群牵引无人机，快速将舰船战斗后的残骸捞回来。
LanguageData.ShipSalvageBay.generalRules.rulesStrings: subject_story->operated a legally-gray vulture fleet, picking the debris of space battles
subject_story->welded several captured ships into a single ungainly hulk
subject_story->served under an AI captain who took a strange pleasure in "eating" defeated ships
LanguageData.ShipSalvageBayGlitter.label: 闪耀科技打捞港
LanguageData.ShipSalvageBayGlitter.description: 利用反向JT光束快速将舰船战斗后的漂浮物捞回来。\n注：实际建造打捞港将需要一个纠缠流形，这是个非常罕见的先进组件。
LanguageData.ShipSalvageBayGlitter.generalRules.rules: subject_story->pirated interplanetary shipping, capturing small spacecraft with an asteroid-mounted tractor beam
subject_story->salvaged the wreckage of a spacefaring archotech which had apparently committed suicide
subject_story->jury-rigged a warship's drive to pull torpedoes away from vulnerable civilian craft
LanguageData.ShipShuttleBay.label: 穿梭机港
LanguageData.ShipShuttleBay.description: 解锁建造穿梭机停靠港，用于运送货物和进出舰船。
LanguageData.ShipShuttleBay.generalRules.rulesStrings: subject_story->suffered decompression injuries due to a malfunctioning plasma barrier
subject_story->worked in "cargo acquisition" for an orbital slave trader
subject_story->squandered vast amounts of wealth on a fleet of racing shuttles
LanguageData.ShuttlePersonal.label: 个人穿梭机
LanguageData.ShuttlePersonal.description: 解锁建造能够抵达轨道的简易单人穿梭机。
LanguageData.ShuttlePersonal.generalRules.rulesString: subject_story->operated a courier service, ferrying VIPs and precious cargo into orbit
subject_story->wrote this book while starving alone in orbit, following a miscalculated launch trajectory
subject_story->belonged to a fringe ideologion which shunned nuclear technology, preferring simpler chemical rockets
LanguageData.ShuttleCargo.label: 穿梭机
LanguageData.ShuttleCargo.description: 解锁建造使用微型化船舶组件技术模块化穿梭机。只要相应的技术被研究出来，就可以对其进行改装升级。
LanguageData.ShuttleCargo.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->served the Imperial navy as a shuttle mechanic, optimizing the standard chassis for specific tasks
LanguageData.ShuttleCargo.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->flew interception missions aboard a converted cargo shuttle
LanguageData.ShuttleCargo.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->escaped pirate captivity by jury-rigging a nuclear thermal rocket engine
LanguageData.ShuttleHeavy.label: 重型穿梭机
LanguageData.ShuttleHeavy.description: 设计一个更大的穿梭机底盘，使穿梭机能够运输更多货物的同时还能多安装一个炮塔。
LanguageData.ShuttleHeavy.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->evacuated colonists from the caveworld Grodol IX when its crust became unstable
LanguageData.ShuttleHeavy.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->flew bombing missions against enemy starships
LanguageData.ShuttleHeavy.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->claimed that an archotech whispered in a dream "just make it bigger."
LanguageData.ShuttleDropship.label: 超重型穿梭机
LanguageData.ShuttleDropship.description: 解锁建造目前最流行的超大型穿梭机，其通常会被用作重型战斗机或海军空降船
LanguageData.ShuttleDropship.generalRules.rulesString: subject_story->witnessed an AI persona seek self-determination by escaping into space
subject_story->led the boarding operation which crippled the Imperial flagship during the fall of Sophiamunda
subject_story->decided that existing shuttlecraft simply weren't large enough
LanguageData.ShipTurretAC.label: 舰载机炮
LanguageData.ShipTurretAC.description: 解锁建造小型舰对舰实弹武器。与能量武器不同，这种武器需要弹药但几乎不产生热量。
LanguageData.ShipTurretAC.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->saw energy weapons as needlessly complex, preferring the impact of metal on metal
LanguageData.ShipTurretAC.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->jury-rigged civilian spacecraft for a desperate assault on a pirate fortress
LanguageData.ShipTurretAC.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->accidentally ordered more uranium than the ship's reactor could burn, and sought a use for it
LanguageData.ShipTurretLaser.label: 舰载激光炮
LanguageData.ShipTurretLaser.description: 解锁建造小型舰对舰激光武器。具有高破坏力但仅能在短距离使用。可拦截鱼雷。
LanguageData.ShipTurretLaser.generalRules.rulesString: subject_story->sacrificed one eye to an archotech in exchange for the secrets of laser weaponry (later losing the other eye to laser backscatter)
subject_story->used a modified mining laser to breach the armor of a mechanoid assault craft
subject_story->was shocked and disgusted to learn that lasers do not actually go "pew pew"
LanguageData.ShipTurretPlasma.label: 舰载等离子炮
LanguageData.ShipTurretPlasma.description: 解锁建造小型舰对舰等离子武器。这种各方面性能平衡的武器适合在中距离作战使用。
LanguageData.ShipTurretPlasma.generalRules.rulesStrin: subject_story->destroyed an enemy boarding shuttle by venting plasma from a warship's fusion reactor
subject_story->went mad while attempting to prove why high-temperature plasma shouldn't be green
subject_story->claimed to have learned this technology from an intelligent star whose internal plasma filaments function as a crude nervous system
LanguageData.ShipTurretKinetic.label: 舰载轨道炮
LanguageData.ShipTurretKinetic.description: 解锁建造小型舰对舰电磁加速武器。在长距离作战中最有效。
LanguageData.ShipTurretKinetic.generalRules.rulesStri: subject_story->was an unwilling participant in a game played between archotechs, who competed to target a human spacecraft from the furthest possible distance
subject_story->took symbolic vengeance on the Sophian navy by accelerating its victims' ashes to relativistic speeds
subject_story->operated the mass driver of a lunar mining facility, launching containers of helium-3 into precise orbits
LanguageData.ShipHeatsink.label: 船舶热容系统
LanguageData.ShipHeatsink.description: 通过将热量传到到散热器中，使你的舰船武器和护盾能保持更长时间的运作。
LanguageData.ShipHeatsink.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->suffered disfiguring burns after a coolant overpressure event
LanguageData.ShipHeatsink.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->wore down an enemy ship by virtue of superior heat capacity and strategic venting
LanguageData.ShipHeatsink.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->led a mutiny of the ship's gremlin labor caste by strategically disabling heatsinks
LanguageData.ShipHeatManifold.label: 紧急排热端口
LanguageData.ShipHeatManifold.description: 解锁建造将携带热量的熔融银喷射入太空，以达成快速排热目的装置。
LanguageData.ShipHeatManifold.generalRules.rulesStrin: subject_story->served aboard a ship whose AI was obsessed with contingency planning
subject_story->belonged to an ideoligion which eschewed material wealth as the temptation of Mammon
subject_story->took the Ishwallan naval motto of "Victory At Any Cost" a bit too literally
LanguageData.ShipTurretMedium.label: 巡洋舰武器
LanguageData.ShipTurretMedium.description: 解锁建造大型舰炮，适合中等体积的战舰。
LanguageData.ShipTurretMedium.generalRules.rulesStrin: subject_story->was taken captive during an arms race between rival planets, forced to design starship weaponry for the opposing side
subject_story->oversaw the retrofit of an interstellar passenger liner into a vessel of war
subject_story->led a slave rebellion during the fall of Sophiamunda, jury-rigging weapons large enough to threaten Imperial warships
LanguageData.ShipTurretLarge.label: 主力舰武器
LanguageData.ShipTurretLarge.description: 解锁建造模块化的脊峰武器，其通常只在主力舰上能看到。
LanguageData.ShipTurretLarge.generalRules.rulesString: subject_story->fought in the last stand of Old Ishwalla, desperately firing asteroid-based weapons against an endless horde of mechanoid dropships
subject_story->served aboard the KSS Judgement, an archotech-built starship whose primary gun was rumored to be kilometers long
subject_story->followed an eccentric ideoligion whose tenets limited starships to only carry a single weapon
LanguageData.ShipTorpedoes.label: 舰载鱼雷
LanguageData.ShipTorpedoes.description: 向敌舰发射能有效压制护盾的鱼雷。
subject_story->took control of a glitterworld antimatter-production facility, diverting its output to manufacture antigrain torpedoes
subject_story->was rumored to have died by riding a space torpedo while waving a cowboy hat
subject_story->developed laser-reflective coatings for space torpedoes, improving their ability to survive point defenses
LanguageData.Holodeck_Basic.label: 基础全息投影仪
LanguageData.Holodeck_Basic.description: 一个用简单部件组装的娱乐用全息投影仪
LanguageData.Holodeck_Basic.generalRules.rulesStrings: subject_story->sought escape from a life of alternating boredom and dread on the post-apocalyptic world Ishwalla
subject_story->claimed that holodeck simulations are "basically a joywire with extra steps" but chose to construct them anyway
subject_story->wanted to engage in physically-impossible acts best left to the reader's imagination
LanguageData.Holodeck_Standard.label: 先进全息投影仪
LanguageData.Holodeck_Standard.description: 使用先进的高分辨率技术建造的一个改进版全息投影仪。
LanguageData.Holodeck_Standard.generalRules.rulesStri: subject_story->designed training simulations for surgeons and engineers
subject_story->claimed that holodeck simulations are a plot by AI to keep humans in a docile state of derealization
subject_story->oversaw an insidious plot to reduce a planet's population by diverting sexual activity towards virtual partners
LanguageData.Holodeck_AI.label: 智能全息投影仪
LanguageData.Holodeck_AI.description: 利用人格AI来为你的殖民者创造无穷无尽且十分有趣的模拟游戏。
LanguageData.Holodeck_AI.generalRules.rulesStrings.1: subject_story->claimed that the highest form of art is creating a world that the user can fully inhabit
LanguageData.Holodeck_AI.generalRules.rulesStrings.2: subject_story->warned that a holodeck's machine person must monitor its users for addictive tendencies
LanguageData.Holodeck_AI.generalRules.rulesStrings.3: subject_story->led the so-called Tartarus Project, intended to keep criminals in an endlessly creative state of suffering
